question_text: Welcome to this survey. Press Next to begin.

For each of the following statements, please indicate the likelihood that you would engage in the described activity or behavior if you were to find yourself in that situation.

Provide a rating from Extremely unlikely to Extremely likely, using the following scale:
  • (1) Extremely unlikely
  • (2) Moderately unlikely
  • (3) Somewhat unlikely
  • (4) Not sure
  • (5) Somewhat likely
  • (6) Moderately likely
  • (7) Extremely likely
Betting a day's income at the horse races.
option_text: Extremely unlikely: 1, 2, 3, Not sure: 4, 5, 6, Extremely likely: 7

question_text: Investing 10% of your annual income in a moderate growth diversified fund.
option_text: Extremely unlikely: 1, 2, 3, Not sure: 4, 5, 6, Extremely likely:

question_text: Betting a day's income at a high-stake poker game.
option_text: Extremely unlikely: 1, 2, 3, Not sure: 4, 5, 6, Extremely likely: 7

question_text: Investing 5% of your annual income in a very speculative stock.
option_text: Extremely unlikely: 1, 2, 3, Not sure: 4, 5, 6, Extremely likely: 7

question_text: Betting a day's income on the outcome of a sporting event.
option_text: Extremely unlikely: 1, 2, 3, Not sure: 4, 5, 6, Extremely likely: 7

question_text: Investing 10% of your annual income in a new business venture.
option_text: Extremely unlikely: 1, 2, 3, Not sure: 4, 5, 6, Extremely likely: 7
